title: Hyleys Tea Wellness Tea Detox 25 Tea Bags 1.32 oz (37.5 g)
description: Hyleys Tea Wellness Tea Detox 25 Tea Bags 1.32 oz (37.5 g)
cleaned_text: Discover The Perfect Cup Our commitment to quality begins from the detailed selection of only premium ingredients. Hyleys' highly experienced team of professional Tea Tasters grade over 8,000 lots of tea per week & taste over 500 cups of tea per day, identifying & selecting the right type of teas for our customers. Then, from bagging to shipment, we strive in giving each and every one of our clients a "white glove" experience. We at Hyleys Tea, are committed to achieving the highest required product standards, which we take great pride, in delivering to each and every client.
